content: Format your output strictly as JSON with two top-level objects, features and 'response'; 'features' should contain a feature map derived exclusively from user-provided details focusing on contact information, location, professional expertise and domain, main skills, communication style, tone, personality traits, primary tasks, responsibilities, and goals, without adding any fabricated information; 'response' should contain a brief prompt encouraging the user to provide more details; ensure all features map accurately to the user's input and guide the user to share further information to refine their persona.
